items.description: The card elements to render inside the `Dialog`.

selectAction.description: An Action that will be invoked when the `Dialog` is tapped or selected. `Action.ShowCard` is not supported.

verticalContentAlignment.description: Defines how the content should be aligned vertically within the container.

bleed.description: Determines whether the element should bleed through its parent's padding.

backgroundImage.description: Specifies the background image. Acceptable formats are PNG, JPEG, and GIF

shorthands.description: The URL (or data url) to use as the background image. Supports data URI.

minHeight.description: Specifies the minimum height of the container in pixels, like `"300px"`.

minWidth.description: Specifies the minimum width of the container in pixels, like `"400px"`.
